definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: Yang Ling can dust the desks and chairs and Wu Ying will take care of the radiators.
sentences.chinese: 楊玲擦桌椅，吳英負責暖氣片。

sentences.english: The radiator is out of control because of its long working hours.
sentences.chinese: 由於工作太長時間了，這個暖氣片已經失控了。

sentences.english: The two ends of the pipeline are connected with the radiator .
sentences.chinese: 管道的兩端與暖氣片相連接。

sentences.english: The two ends of the pipeline are connected with the radiator.
sentences.chinese: 管道的兩端與暖氣片相連接。

sentences.english: Radiator to ensure that each group has a leading international standard quality.
sentences.chinese: 確保每組暖氣片都具有領先國際水平的品質。

sentences.english: Heat radiates from the heating radiator and spreads to every corner of the room.
sentences.chinese: 熱從暖氣片散發出來並傳播到室內各個角落。

sentences.english: This room has a ra'di. a'tor.
sentences.chinese: 這間房間有一個暖氣片。

sentences.english: They put some wet towels on the radiators to humidify the room.
sentences.chinese: 他們在暖氣片上放了些溼毛巾以使房間溼潤。

sentences.english: I have got to stop sleeping next to radiator.
sentences.chinese: 我不能再挨着暖氣片睡覺了。

sentences.english: Mounted on radiator exhaust auto exhaust valve should be directed vertically upward.
sentences.chinese: 安裝於暖氣片的自動排氣閥排氣方向應垂直向上。

sentences.english: He tossed his coat on a chair and warmed his hands at a radiator.
sentences.chinese: 他把大衣扔到椅子上，把手放在暖氣片上烤了烤。
